job.title: Senior Data Scientist
job.description: Your role as the Senior Data Scientist is to support stakeholders through data science techniques and building the solutions for the businesss key initiatives In addition you will synthesize and leverages the businesss dataset and data to enhance the business capabilities for overall goal achievement You will be helping the business to continue its evolution into a datadriven culture and will apply and inspire the adoption of advanced data science across the business You will report to Data Science Manager and working closely with the Marketing Sales and Customer Success
